cc.title: Coins Converter  💸
cc.description: Money is measured using coins. They have multiple types with different values. Manipulating and converting them will be useful. Here you can perform multiple operations and conversions.

value-to-stacks.title: Absolute value to Coins stacks
value-to-stacks.tooltip: Type how much money you have that we convert it into coins stacks!

stacks-to-value.title: Coins stacks to Absolute value
stacks-to-value.tooltip: Type your coins stacks quantity and we convert it to the absolute value!

commands.title: Generated commands
commands.tooltip: Here we have some generated commands based on your results!

mr.title: Mining Statistics ⛏️
mr.description: There is a mining system that allow players to gather resources. Statistics and a projection of results would be cool to understand how is the progress going.

log-to-statistics.title: Mining Chat log to statistics
log-to-statistics.tooltip: Copy and paste here your mining chat log and we will convert into statistics!

resume.title: Statistics and Projections
resume.tooltip: Based on your values, we can extract information and project some approximations!

ds.title: Combat Statistics ⚔️
ds.description: Character inflict damage through attacks, so having some detailed information from logs about it would be cool. (Mean, Max, Min, etc)

log-to-statistics.title: Battle Chat log to statistics
log-to-statistics.tooltip: Copy and paste here your battle chat log and we will convert into statistics!

resume.title: Statistics
resume.tooltip: Based on your attacks, we can extract information and project some approximations!
